definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一套基于静电收集法的双道瞬时土壤测氡仪。

sentences.english: The content of radon gas and methane bacteria indicates obvious abnormity above the gas pool.
sentences.chinese: 气田上方氡气和甲烷菌的含量存在明显的异常。

sentences.english: Outdoor radon levels are usually very low.
sentences.chinese: 室外的氡水平通常很低。

sentences.english: Bantang mineral spring is a hypefthermy sulfate radon spring.
sentences.chinese: 半汤矿泉为高温硫酸盐氡泉。

sentences.english: Significant health effects have been seen in uranium miners who are exposed to high levels of radon.
sentences.chinese: 在接触高水平氡的铀矿工人中观察到显著的健康影响。

sentences.english: A radon progeny continuous monitor was developed.
sentences.chinese: 本工作研制氡子体连续测量仪。

sentences.english: Theoretical consideration is taken up to the increase in radon daughter's concentration under local purification.
sentences.chinese: 从理论上分析了净化过程中氡子体浓度增长的规律。

sentences.english: At the same time, the measure of ground Radon is proved to be an effective method in geothermal field exploration.
sentences.chinese: 同时指出地表氡气测量是热田勘查的有效途径。

sentences.english: The daughter nuclides of radon and thoron tend to become attached.
sentences.chinese: 氡和钍射气的子体易被气溶胶吸附。

sentences.english: When inhaled, the radiation exposure from radon may lead to lung cancer.
sentences.chinese: 当吸入之后，来自氡的放射暴露可导致人们罹患肺癌。

sentences.english: A passive sampling technique with electric collecting for measurements of radon flux rate is described.
sentences.chinese: 本文描述了测量氡析出率的驻极体收集被动采样法。

sentences.english: Due to dilution in the air, outdoor radon levels are usually very low.
sentences.chinese: 鉴于在空气中的稀释，室外的氡水平通常很低。

sentences.english: Tile in the main source of radon emitted by radium.
sentences.chinese: 瓷砖中所放射出来的氡主要来源镭。

sentences.english: All things conspired towards the suggestion that the radon-exhausting from mined-out area should be applied widely in uranium mines.
sentences.chinese: 作者建议采空区氡抽排应在铀矿山广泛推广使用。

sentences.english: There radon concentrations will severalfold to hundred times increasing when using spring water in the hotel rooms.
sentences.chinese: 氡浓度比没有使用温泉水时高出几倍甚至几百倍。
